name: Chainsaw Man Anime Style LoRA
description:
Chainsaw Man Anime style LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕


From a dataset of screenshots from the first season

Should work perfectly on AnyLoRA at weight 1. Increase accuracy with csm anime style. Works great with my Makima LoRA at 0.6 weight.

Remember this is not a character LoRA. It can come close to some characters from their description but you'll need proper character embeddings or LoRA to make them accurate. Last pic is also using controlnet, as there is no chainsaw head lora at the moment.

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight according to the instructions (by default it's :1)
